list.title: EXPECTED_MINUTES_IN_OVEN
list.description: The expected oven time in minutes.

list.title: PREPARATION_MINUTES_PER_LAYER
list.description: The number of minutes it takes to prepare a single layer.

list.title: preparationTimeInMinutes
list.description: Given a number of layers, determines the total preparation time.

list.title: remainingMinutesInOven
list.description:
Determines the number of minutes the lasagna still needs to remain in the
oven to be properly prepared.

list.title: totalTimeInMinutes
list.description:
Calculates total working time. That is, the time to prepare all the layers
of lasagna, and the time already spent in the oven.
